The video was published on Facebook on S: 2019, and has been shared more than 5,000 times.
The text on the right: hand side of the video states that Borussia Dortmund, a German football team, honors Prophet Muhammad.
The misleading Facebook post: s Indonesian-language caption translates to English as "Mashallah, hundreds of thousands of spectators of the German League forming a 'configuration' to honor Prophet Muhammad PBUH."
The video actually shows football fans a: Saudi Arabia, and not spectators of the German Bundesliga.
